Package controller

Class mainScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.mainScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class mainScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller that handles the logic for the Modify Product screen based on the modifyproduct.fxml file.

      • onPartAdd

        public void onPartAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the Add Part fxml and prepares a stage for it, then displays the new window.
        Parameters:

      • onPartModify

        public void onPartModify​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the selected part and its index to pass to the Modify Part controller, then gets the Modify Part fxml and prepares a stage for it, then displays the new window. Generates an error if no part is selected to be modified.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Not used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Not used.

      • onPartDelete

        public void onPartDelete​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Deletes the selected part from the inventory. Provides a confirmation dialog to allow the user the choice to cancel their action; if user chooses to cancel, no information is removed, and if user chooses OK the selected part is removed and the tableview of associated parts is updated. An error will display if the user attempts to remove a part with no part selected.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Not used.

      • onProductAdd

        public void onProductAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the Add Product fxml and prepares a stage for it, then displays the new window.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Not used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Not used.

      • onProductModify

        public void onProductModify​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the selected product and its index to pass to the Modify Product controller, then gets the Modify Product fxml and prepares a stage for it and displays the new window. Generates an error if no product is selected to be modified.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Not used.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Not used.

      • onProductDelete

        public void onProductDelete​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Deletes the selected product from the inventory. Provides a confirmation dialog to allow the user the choice to cancel their action; if user chooses to cancel, no information is removed, and if user chooses OK the selected product is removed and the tableview of products is updated. An error will display if the user attempts to remove a product with no product selected, or that still has associated parts.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Not used.

      • onExitButton

        public void onExitButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Confirmation dialog that allows user to confirm or cancel closing the program.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Not used.

      • getPartResults

        public void getPartResults​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Searches the list of all parts. The search will look for a partID first, and if no part with that ID is found it will execute a partial string search. Any parts found are added to a list and shown in the updated tableview.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Not used.

      • getProductResults

        public void getProductResults​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Searches the list of all products. The search will look for a productID first, and if no product with that ID is found it will execute a partial string search. Any products found are added to a list and shown in the updated tableview.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Not used.

      • searchByPartName

        private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> searchByPartName​(java.lang.String partialName)
        Method to iterate through allParts and search for any items matching the partial string from user input.
        Parameters:
        partialName - Gets the string to search on from user input in the search text field.
        Returns:
        Returns an ObservableList populated with any items that meet search criteria.

      • searchByPartID

        private Part searchByPartID​(int partID)
        Method to iterate through allParts and search for any items matching the part ID from user input.
        Parameters:
        partID - Gets the Part ID to search on from user input in the search text field.
        Returns:
        Returns the Part matching the Part ID, if any. Returns null if no parts found.

      • searchByProductName

        private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> searchByProductName​(java.lang.String partialName)
        Method to iterate through allProducts and search for any items matching the partial string from user input.
        Parameters:
        partialName - Gets the string to search on from user input in the search text field.
        Returns:
        Returns an ObservableList populated with any items that meet search criteria.

        Parameters:
        productID - Gets the Productt ID to search on from user input in the search text field.
        Returns:
        Returns the Product matching the Product ID, if any. Returns null if no products found.
